author: veithen
msg: Fixed the WAS 7 profile. It was actually testing the right thing, but in the wrong way.

author: sf
msg: Add authz providers for use with mod_authz_core and its RequireAny/RequireAll
We may decide to axe 'ssl-require' again in favor of the generic 'expr'
provider, depending on the development of the ap_expr parser.

author: jeastman
msg: - replaced RunningSumsGaussianAccumulator with OnlineGaussianAccumulator in CDbwEvaluator
- updated unit tests to new metric values
- added a test to ignore empty lines in synthetic control input mappers
